referenceObject.reference: Ferreira, A. C. K., Zambonato, B. P. & Lise, A. A. (2004). New data on Camillina major with the description of the male and the proposition of a new name (Camillina ventana) for a male described by Platnick & Murphy, 1987 from Argentina (Araneae, Gnaphosidae).
